desc: Statement jewelry featuring American Mined gemstones including turquoise, variscite & Oregon sunstone. Each stone is hand-picked for it's beauty. Each setting is completely hand-fabricated from recycled silver and gold. Designed & made in California. Find your new heirloom. Support small, women owned business.

layout.text: Hand Fabricated Statement Jewelry. American Mined Gems. Reclaimed Metals. Your New Heirloom.
